name: chainwhales-monorepo
description: Monorepo for ChainWhales backend and frontend

scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend,python -c blue,green,yellow "pnpm -C backend start:dev" "pnpm -C frontend dev" "sh -c '. .env 2>/dev/null || true; cd algorithms && PYTHONPATH=./src python3 -m chainwhales_algo.examples.run_loop --config configs/sample_config.yaml --interval-seconds 600'"
scripts.dev:no-python: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "pnpm -C backend start:dev" "pnpm -C frontend dev"
